>
[Venomed Tongue](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1810)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305

**Price** 333 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Secrets must be unraveled, no matter how painful. This tattoo of braided tongues provides a +1 item bonus to Deception checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** [Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=71) fills your tongue with venom, causing your deceptions to poison your foes. You use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to [Create a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45), [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), or [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47). Choose one target against whom your Deception check succeeded; that target takes 2d6 [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
